author: GamingBolt
description:
The DOOM series is full of action and over the top moments, and a Slayer who never backs down from his purpose. In this video, we’re diving deep and covering everything you need to know about DOOM's storyline. 

This video is a full recap of the stories from DOOM 1, DOOM 2, DOOM 64, DOOM (2016), and DOOM Eternal, all of which we covered previously. But wait, there's more! As a bonus, we’ve also included the story of DOOM 3. 

That makes this video the definitive DOOM story breakdown. So, here’s how we’re going to do this: first, we’ll cover the original trilogy: DOOM 1, DOOM 2, and DOOM 64. Then we’ll move on to the recent games with DOOM (2016) and DOOM Eternal. 

And finally, we’ll focus on DOOM 3 as a bonus addition to wrap up the video.
title: The COMPLETE Story of DOOM - Everything You Need To Know Before You Begin DOOM: The Dark Ages

author: GamingBolt
description:
After the fantastic Elden Ring and its excellent expansion, Shadow of the Erdtree, Elden Ring Nightreign probably wasn't what players expected from FromSoftware. It retains the same action RPG tenets and open-world exploration but in a co-op multiplayer-focused format with dashes of rogue-like and battle royale.

As the Nightfarers, players drop into Limveld and defeat enemies to become stronger. They can explore the surrounding area for weapons and tackle fortresses to obtain maps that reveal more information. Eventually, the area shrinks, and you need to tackle a boss. Survive the night, and it's on to the next, until the final confrontation against the Nightlord.

With eight playable characters, each with dedicated kits, Relics that you can equip before runs to improve stats and skills, and a focus on team play (though you can still go in solo), Elden Ring Nightreign is unlike anything seen from the developer. 

It's out on May 30th for Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PS4, PS5, and PC -
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - 15 Things You NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy

author: GamingBolt
description:
More than a year after offering the world its first ever look at the highly anticipated Grand Theft Auto 6, Rockstar Games recently released a second trailer for the upcoming open world crime epic- and it’s fair to say that the game is continuing to look incredibly promising. 

The newest trailer for GTA 6 perfectly struck a balance between showing exciting new footage and still holding enough back to maintain a level of mystery- though that, of course, means that the wait for the next trailer is going to feel excruciatingly long. 

Not only is GTA 6 still a little over a year away, Rockstar is also a company that historically likes to do things on its own terms, which means trailer 3 is likely a ways off.
title: GTA 6 Trailer 2 Left Us Wanting For More - There’s Still So Much We Don’t Know
